section.name: Implementation: org.ximtec.igesture.util.additions3d.Note3D
section.p: iGesture uses the org.ximtec.igesture.util.additions3d.Note3D class to represent gestures captured from a 3D input device. A Note3D consists of time stamped Point3Ds and of AccelerationSamples . Beside the timestamp, a point contains the coordinates. The schema of the XML note representation is shown in Listing.
